### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Boiler at position (-13.5, 22.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -13.5, 22.0) with coal in its inventory and currently not connected to a water source.
- Pipe connections leading from the boiler to the offshore pump.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing boiler and steam engine
- Ensure there are no existing objects in the way before attempting to place a boiler or steam engine. Check the target location for obstructions.

### Errors when connecting offshore pump to boiler
- Make sure the boiler is placed correctly and is within the connection range of the offshore pump before attempting to connect them.

### Errors when checking inventory of wooden chest
- Verify the position of the wooden chest before attempting to check its inventory. Ensure that the wooden chest exists at the specified coordinates.

### Errors when adding coal to the boiler
- Ensure that the boiler is placed correctly and is within range before attempting to add coal. Confirm that the boiler is operational and ready to accept fuel. 

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Always move closer to the target location before placing any entities to avoid distance-related placement errors.
